name: Patagonia Micro D Snap-T Jacket - Infants to Children
description:
Retro styling combines with the goodness of fleece in this pint-sized hoodie for kids. Recycled polyester fleece keeps little cores warm when trekking through snowy forests. And it won't get bogged down with moisture when hiking or skiing.Recycled polyester microdenier fleece is lightweight, ultra-soft and quick to dry.Elastic binding on hood, cuffs and hem seals in warmth.Classic Patagonia Snap-T chest pocket.Handwarmer pockets keep hands toasty.

Regular fit



Fit guide

Technical garments, designed for specific activities have features that aren’t always adaptable to general use. For example, cycling clothing is longer in the back and arms. Activity aside, the fit of MEC clothing falls into these categories:





Tight, with no room to spare.





Very close fit, with a bit of room.





Generous, but not oversized.





Oversized with lots of room for layers.


All MEC men’s and boy’s pants are regular rise.




        Sustainability
